title: (x) Search Font of Dasani Water Campaign / Generic gothic - various options {Marc O}
content:
Hi Folks,

I'm looking out for a font I've seen on a campaign for Dasani water. It's near Bell Gothic Black, but the R seems to be different, an the lengths of the W and M are slightly different. Maybe someone has another suggestion. Thx in advance.

Fux

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140927105227im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dasani_mueve_tu_water_man1_5640.jpg)
author: Fux

comments.content: Look at Trade Gothic, News Gothic, Franklin Gothic, Benton Sans...
